original_text: On the next day we departed and came to Caesarea, and we entered the house of Philip the evangelist, who was one of the seven, and stayed with him.
korean_text: 이튿날 떠나 가이사랴에 이르러 일곱 집사 중 하나인 전도자 빌립의 집에 들어가서 머무르니라

sentences.original_text: On the next day we departed
and we entered the house of Philip the evangelist
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 복음 전도자 빌립의 집에 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: who was one of the seven
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 일곱 사람 중의 한 사람이었으니
